values:
i'll never be onf of those fakers.

i'll be honest, always:

i hate my life.  i hate it, i won't kill myself, i'm a wimp, but i hate my life.  hate it hate it hate it hate it hate it hate it hate it hate it don't pity me your life sucks too and you know it i hate it hate it hate it hate it why would we be put here? WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYy



i'll never be a faker.  i won't lie to myself, i won't lie to oyu.


so that said, i hate my life.


i'm not suicidal, i promise.  i just despise my easily-despicable life.

i finally unterstand what it means to be a true artist (haha)

stop believing in love


you're right

it's fruitless


or nonexistent



there is no such thing as a selfless act and
empathy is a mask of insecurity





so what do we have

and what do we have to live for?






where you go i may not be able to follow

so sorry

would it be cliche to say the wind was whispering?

wisping then,


and spoke no name


(quite the brazen introduction,

wouldn't you say?)

but at least he knew precisely where he was going.

 


i don't stop and turn for a sentence.

i am simply wanderful;

i wonder at anythings,

torn asunder:

there are either manythings to catch my eye,

or there is  no t   h         i

 

 

 

 


when i crawl out of the latter,

i will be sure to call--

 


but then you will just be on my list of too-manys.

"i could duck out

get the fuck out of here

and the door latch

wouldn't catch an ear."

that was fun. i miss you guys.

you bitches need to start being honest again. every time i feel like we're in a good place, there you go  hiding something again. i have left myself completely vulnerable. i have nothing left just for me. not one thing.

COMMUNICATE. LOVE. LOVE TRUTH, LOVE OPENNESS, LOVE ME.


i love you. in ridiculous and unfair amounts, i love you.
